Directives.name: Chart
Directives.Description: Directive to generate basic chart object

Directives.name: X Axis
Directives.Description: Creates an axis for determining horizontal positioning. The first x axis created will cross the first y axis at zero. The second will be positioned at the top of the chart. Any further x axes will be hidden but can still be used for positioning.

field.Description: Define from which data field the axis is generated

type.Description: The type of axis to be generated. Options can be Category , Measure , Percent, Time

group-by.Description: The order in which series are added will determine the order they are drawn

order-by.Description: Add a rule by which the values in a group on a category axis will be ordered

title.Description: title to be displayed with the axis

prefix.Description: prepend a text to axis ticks

suffix.Description: append a text to axis ticks

Directives.name: Y Axis
Directives.Description: Creates an axis for determining vertical positioning. The first y axis created will cross the first x axis at zero. The second will be positioned at the right of the chart. Any further y axes will be hidden but can still be used for positioning

field.Description: Define from which data field the axis is generated

type.Description: The type of axis to be generated. Options can be Category , Measure , Percent, Time

group-by.Description: The order in which series are added will determine the order they are drawn

order-by.Description: Add a rule by which the values in a group on a category axis will be ordered

title.Description: title to be displayed with the axis

prefix.Description: prepend a text to axis ticks

suffix.Description: append a text to axis ticks

Directives.name: Z Axis
Directives.Description: Creates an axis for determining scale of elements. This axis does not render any visual elements and currently only affects bubble plots.

field.Description: The data field which is used to generate axis

title.Description: title to be displayed with the axis

min.Description: Override the minimum value retrieved from field

max.Description: Override the maximum value retrieved from field

filter.Description: title to be displayed with the axis

yaxis.Description: Override the minimum value retrieved from field

data.Description: Override the maximum value retrieved from field
